website_summaries.verdict: A highly affordable and versatile indoor mosquito killer.
pros: Compact design is perfect for travel or home
Uses LED lights to attract mosquitoes
Quiet killing grid that won't disturb sleep
The best option for budget-conscious buyers
cons: Due to its size, this mosquito killer is most effective in smaller spaces

customer_reviews.title: Didn't worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving one start because it looks slick at night and it turns on. Its mosquito season where I live and i can see in a daily basis 2 -3 mosquitos flying everywhere. I bought this thinking I would see 1 or 2 dead every morning. I've owned the device for around 10 days. I have mosquito bites in my hands even my forehead! and the death toll of mosquitos within the device is still at 0!. For some reason they don't get attracted to the light so of course they don't get electrocuted. Not sure if im doing something wrong or what but it didn't worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rodoval507

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews
customer_reviews.text: Yelulu (aka GLOUE or ZIAWAY) offered me a gift card for $10 for an "honest review", or $5 for feedback I felt their "products are not good enough". Here goes. Amazon's customer review creation guidelines prohibit posting a review for money. The positive reviews for this product are likely paid for. In the space of a week, I have not found a single insect zapped by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Friedman Wagner-Dobler

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and smells
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with others who have said these don't work and are more of a gimmick than legitimate pest control product.
customer_reviews.author: Zenacity

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Compact and works! Have had it in use for 3 weeks, and looking my photo after I cleaned it using an old toothbrush, you can see the results. We have it plugged into the wall in master bedroom and absolutely dark except for this glowing blue light. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Sosslau

customer_reviews.title: plain doesn't work. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: it sits 3 feet from my laptop. The mosquitoes and no-seeums ignore the trap and fly right to my computer screen. This after the light has been on and in a dark room. When I come in and open my laptop, they come flying to my screen. The wavelength of the blue light apparently is not correct for bugs. I wanted this to work, but it has no affect on flying insects. Update. Mosquito in my ear and unit is 3 ft from my head. Bugs have absolutely no interest in this product.
customer_reviews.author: NoCrap

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: My Apartment was infested with flies. I found this bug zapper, but didn't think it would do much. The first night i used it, i only had a few flies left and by the next morning they were gone !! This is definitly a quality product. will be buying more because it does what it says it will do !!! Please try one, but buy the "Gloue" brand. I am absolutely happy with my purchase !!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Zap!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bug zapper because we were having an issue with gnats. I’ve noticed dead bugs beneath the zapper, not just gnats. I placed it near the front door on the inside and it’s doing a great job. I’m considering purchasing a couple more since were approaching rainy/mosquito season.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best zapper ever! works surprisingly well, there was always a couple mosquitos flying around drove me nuts, problem solved,thanks to Gloue’s bug Zapper,don’t have to chase them around the house no more. Just plug it in an outlet and leave alone and it does the job for you, how awesome is that? Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This really works (in the dark)
customer_reviews.text: It's so satisfying to watch this thing in action. Keep in mind that it works best in the dark, so place it away from windows and other light sources for the best effect. Nice chemical free option to get rid of annoying flying pests.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply made and I wouldnt recommend it. Plugged it in and wouldnt turn on unplugged it and one of the blades was still stuck in the electrical outlet
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Ray

customer_reviews.title: Does not attract bugs
customer_reviews.text: This thing caught some gnats, those small pesky black flies that look like fruit flies- but it didn't catch more than my wall, or my candle or my sink or toilet in the bathroom. We keep our house VERY clean and for some reason these annoying flies keep coming to one bathroom in the house. I hoped this zapper would work in there, but the problem has not been changed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Semi

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Item broke after first use. I purchased two of these and the metal part of the plug got stuck in the outlet on the first use. Material is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Myka F.

customer_reviews.title: This little zapper really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, easy to use bug zapper! I wasn't even sure it was doing anything, but there were no more pesky gnats and mosquitoes flying around. I checked the GLOUE and it is full of little dead flying insects! I'm very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Waddell

customer_reviews.title: It did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. Easy to use, compact and easy to clean. Would have gone with a full 5 but I feel that the light should be a little brighter with the thought that it might attract a few more critters. Got it to help with fruit flies that are bad where I live. It has put a real dent in them and makes it hard for them to reproduce fast enough to keep up their population. Wouldn't hesitate to buy it again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I'd give zero stars if I could. It appears to just be a blue light, completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: monicann

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for few days, a nice door blocker, it is good for a small place, plugging it to my window wall next to balcony, and I did see It works!
customer_reviews.author: Shi W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our open office space to get rid of some of the flying insects that come through our warehouse doors. The Bug Zapper has done a good job of catching the bugs in the nearby area. Overall, our space is too large for it to capture all the bugs, but this 1 plug in does a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: julia yip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for small areas such as bedrooms. I installed in our Master room since we didn't want too much light and haven't seeing any more bugs since then. Good pricing and easy to clean. Cannot ask for more, I was a real good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ALS P.

customer_reviews.title: Kills mosquito
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and their customer service is excellent. The adapter prong broke when I removed the unit from the wall outlet. I reach out to the seller and after they got done with their investigation. They immediately sent me a replacement. No charge.
customer_reviews.author: twoods

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: WITHIN 5 MINUTES OF BEING PLUGGED IN 2 OF THE FOUR led lites went out. left it plugged in for 48 hrs. did not kill a single fly. changed locations in same room couple of times. no difference. useless!
customer_reviews.author: randy endicott

customer_reviews.title: Don t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thing I could have ever got! First I plugged it in and nothing happened. Then I decided to move it to another place ( thought maybe it wasn't dark enough where I had it) nothing again. Also the light blew out completely. When I took it out of the outlet the prong fell out ! I had it for over a month and thought it would be a waste of money & time sending it back. The cost is Rediculous on this to begin with and with shipping over $25.00 ! What a joke ! Wiuldnt mind if it didn't fall apart and actually worked . Don t waste your money !
customer_reviews.author: Debra Marge

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Zap the Critters That get indoors during the summer
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something to use indoors to zap those blood sucking mosquitoes this is the ticket. I put this one in an area where the critters tend to congregate and then when I turn out the lights for the night I'm not waking up in the Morning with Mosquito bites. Instead a few fried critters. I've never heard it zap but when I don't get bitten and I seed the carcasses of the blood suckers then it is doing it's job. Now if you have an infestation or if outside this is probably not large enough. This works indoors for small pesky insects that get in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Area coverage
customer_reviews.text: The bug zapper did not work. The description says it covers so much area but the measurement is in "meters". Area coverage is not shown in "square feet". I placed another bug trap and caught flying insects within a few hours. Not worth the cost. I give it one star. Item has been returned without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boothman

customer_reviews.title: Totally SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at at all. Sadly it has yet to kill one mosquito! We have even brought this item to the mosquito and it dod nothing! Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Lloyd-James

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about Amazon reviews
customer_reviews.text: I received a letter from the makers of Gloue telling me they would give me a $10 coupon for a good review. I have always placed a great deal of truth in the remarks of the buyers when making a purchase. Since my Gloue is not working very well (after three days being plugged in I only found 7 mosquitoes in the trap) I am inclined to disquard the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Childs

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. I even changed locations in my house to give it a chance. I did not have one dead fly. I had plenty of flies flying around too. I really wanted this product to work because I have tried everything. I ended up returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: annette didszun

customer_reviews.title: Great Bug Zapprt
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget worked great! We had little gnats flying around and no matter what we tried we couldn't get rid of them. After we set up this zapper it took about a week, and no more gnats!!! It's been great!
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product is cute, easy to be used without instructions. I used it in the near my indoor plants. It works quietly and efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Jessie jessie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Typically mosquitos are not a problem in my neighborhood but for the last 2-3 weeks we have had a significant number of them flying around inside my home. They have been biting my family members and have become a real nuisance. I bought four of these units based on all the positive reviews for different rooms in my home. After being plugged in for 5 days none of the units had a single dead bug. I literally saw mosquitos flight right by the zapper and not go inside. I ended up returning all 4.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ali

customer_reviews.title: May work for you...just not for me
customer_reviews.text: OK..Had this thing now for some time. I have it at a point in the house that is very easy to "monitor".. It hasn't killed a single insect that I've seen now ever. They can be having a hoe-down around this and not one will be attracted to it... Perhaps the insects here are just smarter than those in the area where this was beta tested. Good new though it does serve as a pretty good "night light" for us~~
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: It works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put in our daughter's room to keep her from getting bit by mosquitoes while she is sleeping. The light is not obnoxiously bright and does not interfere with her trying to sleep. I was afraid that it would make a humming or buzzing noise, but it does not. It is completely silent. We haven't found any more mosquito bites on her since we started using it. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ts82177

customer_reviews.title: Beware buyers!
customer_reviews.text: We placed close to the door...after in the hallway...and after in the living room. It has no affect on flying insects. And when we pull out..... you can see on the pictures. Not only useless but dangerous product! I don't understand the 5* reviews.....
customer_reviews.author: Gabica

customer_reviews.text: We've had it plugged in for over 2 months, not sure if it's working because my son is still getting bit by mosquitos almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if I can continue to use?
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t pay much attention to the size of the device and it seemed a bit bigger by the photos, but my fault for not looking into it more carefully. I had just moved to Arizona and was being eaten alive by mosquitos, but after a day they disappeared and I was finally bite free. I then used it to keep fruit flies away from by basket of bananas, avocados and apples and it worked like a charm. Just wondering if there was a replacement bulb available...?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, and it works
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to use - just plug it in and flip the power switch. Puts out a nice blue glow which attracts the insects. When cleaning, follow the instructions to release the electrical charge with a screwdriver. I didn't expect the contacts to still be charged after unplugging, but used a screwdriver as instructed anyways. It sparked when i did, so I'm glad I followed the instructions. Kills gnats and mosquitoes well.
customer_reviews.author: todd1484

customer_reviews.title: Works for small area
customer_reviews.text: The bug zapper is ok. It does not fit in the plugs I have outside well, reason why I have it upside down in picture. I placed it at my back door to help keep the bugs from coming in. It seems to work ok, it could not take the place of a large hanging one but it would work for a small area. If it plugged into the type of Outlet I have better I would consider getting more.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpeajenni

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad. I was not impressed initially, but a few days later it seems to be fine. It has killed a lot of mosquitos during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Babak B.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal to Get Rid of Bugs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple of these a few weeks ago to see if they would work against new-born mosquitoes and flies that have been invading my house due to the wet and humid weather. These small devices plug in to your ordinary home outlets, and wow they have helped tremendously in controlling the amount of pests that are inside the house. While it did not eliminate all of the bugs, it has only left a really small amount of bugs left. I am sure that after a few more days, those bugs will be gone too! I highly recommend this product if you are having trouble controlling mosquitoes or other flying critters in your home.
customer_reviews.author: ebelin

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money, deceptive product description
customer_reviews.text: Broken English description is deceptive. Does not kill all flying insects. SELLER only mentions those attracted to light after a customer question. It does not even attract or kill flying insects attracted to light. Absolute junk bordering on being an expensive blue nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: You might as well throw your money in the trash. This thing came and had a weird rattle when it arrived but without taking it apart I have no idea if that is "normal". I had a gnat and mosquito infestation in one of the bathrooms and tried this out for 2 nights exactly per specifications. There was not ONE gnat or mosquito carcass in this piece of junk. My flay swatter did a better job of killing them then this ridiculous thing. I feel very foolish that I bought into some of the good reviews here.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome for Gnats!
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about the effectiveness from the reviews, but my office plant has been swarmed with tiny gnats and I was desperate. Turns out this thing is pretty awesome. I have to clean out the tines every couple days I still have to nix the plant as they’re reproducing faster than I can kill them. But still! This little gadget is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Does not kill mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: Does not kill mosquitoes, tried two of these in Vietnam office
customer_reviews.author: Jani

customer_reviews.title: Bug zapper and night light!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about using this plug-in bug zapper but it totally works! I have little flies that were a nuisance. Turned this on at night and after a few days found the dead critters inside! I was SO happy it worked and it doesn't make any noise. Was worried it make loud ZZZZ ZZ ZZZZZ sounds and it doesn't :-) Also as another reviewer said, the purple light serves as a great night light. BUT, sticky traps are more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & effective
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time purchasing this product to deal with our annual pesky fruit flies (lost the first one). Again, it does not disappoint. Overnight the number drastically decreased, with they almost eliminated after a few days (assuming due to eggs hatching over a few days, etc). Great product and I would absolutely recommend and buy it again - just plug it in and go.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that's easy to use and effective, and this bug zapper was it! The light is a little bright, but I just leave it in the living room overnight instead of my room. I was using sprays before this but I hated the smell, so transitioning to this plug in device was a good choice. I would definitely recommend getting this!
customer_reviews.author: teddylu

customer_reviews.title: did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me, possibly because I had it in my bedroom and also had my ceiling fan on; I know fans are also a deterrent but I can't sleep without a fan. I did plug it in to the outlet closest to be door, hoping to attract mosquitos; nope. My house is a mosquito magnet this year. I need to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: CherylFallert

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a basement with a direct access to outside door in the room. I thought having something small like this would help cut down on the random mosquito that got in as I used the door. NOPE. I've watched mosquitos (not even big ones) just hang out on this thing and not be affected. The only bugs it has killed for me are the tiny gnats that are pin head size. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Inconspicuous and effective
customer_reviews.text: I plugged mine into an electrical socket close to my sink to kill drain flies, and then purchased a second one to plug next to the bathroom sink and toilet. The strange thing is that I don't find many dead flies, but I also don't see any flying in my apartment. Not exactly sure why I don't see many dead ones, but I am VERY pleased that I don't see any living ones. In my opinion, this is worth purchasing. The price is low enough that you aren't taking a big risk, and I'll bet you'll be as pleased as I am. (I also sprayed DEET on my screens to repel any outside bugs from entering.)
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for eliminating fruit flies.
customer_reviews.text: This Gloue Zapper is perfect if you want to end fruit fly problems. I am incredibly happy with its performance because it has been the most effective solution that I have found to ending fruit flies. I highly recommend this Zapper if you want to get rid of fruit flies.
customer_reviews.author: J80

customer_reviews.title: Works but problem with prong
customer_reviews.text: This product does work. However, the first one we got had a faulty prong, which stuck in the outlet when I removed the device. When I contacted customer service, they sent another right away. The second one works well, but the problem with the prong does concern me, since I noticed others have had the same problem - it seems to be an issue with quality control and seems like a safety issue as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: I had a small-white moth invasion??? I tried cedar oil, lavender filled sachets and cedar blocks, nothing seemed to be working? I went on line and found a larger bug zapper for the living room. I still saw moths In the bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. I purchased this small plug in bug zapper. I purchased one for my bedroom it was getting rid of the moths... so I purchased two more. I purchased one for the bathroom and one for the kitchen. Moth problem gone!! It took less than a week!
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Great product must Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product .Safe to use in children room .My kids havent gotten moskitos bites since I installed it in thier bedroom .The snap isnt so loud .the light is dim enough to let you sleep.great night.Will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: alex c :)

customer_reviews.title: Great price and actually works, leave on in low lit areas
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this thing killed mosquitos pretty well, it is low lit so best to use as a night light sort of thing. It’s nothing close to those big power type of bug zappers, but for what it is it works well and eased our minds at night with our little one and us. We were getting bit pretty often but with keeping doors closed and leaving these on all the time we haven’t. Give it a few days and u will start to c the bodies pile up.
customer_reviews.author: arturo s.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this zapper to combat the mosquitos that invade my tiny house in Alabama. After a week, it has been great. The bugs go into it and once zapped, stay inside the blue guard. This makes cleaning it out easy by holding them inside until you can open the cover over the trash and knocking them into the bin. No more west nile carrying blood suckers buzzing in my ear while I'm trying to sleep!! Great little product and it's a nice soft night light.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, worked very well.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping is VERY fast. I have used it for about a week. It is very easy to use and it worked very well. I used it for my living room and kitchen area, I can tell there are fewer flies and mosquitoes now. I am happy to see this result and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, easy product
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I've really experienced an issue with gnats and mosquitoes lately. While ACV does work, this plug in zapper works even more effectively, just plug it and its ready, tap to clean. Very happy with my purchase and will surely be buying more for each room of the house!
customer_reviews.author: 636chick

customer_reviews.title: NIGHT LIGHT BUG ZAPPER
customer_reviews.text: I GET THESE LITTLE WINGED FLYING INSECTS THAT GET THROUGH THE SCREEN ON BATHROOM WINDOW., THEY WERE BOTHERING ME IN THE BATHOOM UNTIL I STARTED USING THIS. AMAZINGLY THIS THING HAS BEEN ATTRACTIVE FOR THEM AND THEY FLY IN AND GET ZAPPED! YAY! DEFINITLY ON A SMALL SCALE, BUT WORKED GREAT FOR MY BATHROOM.
customer_reviews.author: c.g.

customer_reviews.title: Seller offered bribe for a good review
customer_reviews.text: The item is meh... It looks cool but doesn't kill much and can't be opened to clean. I would not buy again. Plus, the seller contacted me to get a good review. This always irritates me and tells me that the purchase i made based on reviews was a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: It Works... Sometimes??
customer_reviews.text: I had small flies getting into my garage and from there into my house, so I thought I'd give this guy a shot before trying something bigger. When I first got it, it didn't seem to be working. Took a couple of weeks for the flies to go away, but there was only one dead fly in the zapper. I forgot all about it and just left it there for a couple months. Suddenly flies show up again. I don't know why, but this time it worked and the flies were gone in a couple days. Checked the zapper and it was full of flies.
customer_reviews.author: Cy West

customer_reviews.title: Quality is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, cheap quality, broke straight away now the pins are stuck in the socket.
customer_reviews.author: leaw45

customer_reviews.title: No more bug bites!
customer_reviews.text: Summer months lead to an influx of mosquitoes, gnats, and bug bites - not anymore with the GLOUE bug zapper! Easy to simply plug in and turn in, it emits a nice purple glow that is easily used as a night light. It's silent and doesn't make any zapping noise when it catches the bugs. Very simple to use and easy to follow instructions on how to clean it. One unit easily solved our problem in our small apartment, I can see buying multiple if you hav a larger house. Will definitely recommend to people with summer mosquitoes indoors!
customer_reviews.author: Devin VC

customer_reviews.title: Seeya Later, Mr. Mosquito
customer_reviews.text: Mosquitoes keep finding their way into my condo in the Summer months. I was getting bit like crazy last year. I thought I would try this product out. In terms of ease of use, it does not get any easier. Take it out of the packaging, plug it in, flip the switch. I checked back 24 hours later and saw results. I checked this morning and saw an enormous mosquito had met their match. I am sure this product has saved me from getting bit numerous times already. I have not tried to clean the device yet, but it seems straightforward enough. Five stars alone for making this Summer a little less uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Effective product that kills several flies
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product for about a week and appreciate the ease of use and bugs killed so far. It was very easy to plug in lights up right away. I definitely agree with the recommendation to keep in a dark place so that the flies are attracted to it. The one reason I haven’t given it a 5 is it seems effective at small gnats but doesn’t seem to get all the fruit flies. It has gotten some but several have not seemed to have take to it, so I’d like to find a way to get more fruit flies sucked in, not sure if it will be this device or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made - Broke Off in the Outlet where it was plugged in
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a perfect solution to the periodic mosquito that gets inside the house. It lasted less than a month before one of the electrical prongs broke off and was stuck in the outlet when I was going to unplug and clean it. Super disappointed. Waste of $
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inside bug zapper to help with the moth problem in the master closet. The first night I plugged in it killed about 5-7 moths. Next few days, about 10-15 more moths were killed. Some of them ended up on the floor beneth the light, and a few were stuck in the metal electrical element. You just gently pop off the plastic guard and brush of the element with a q-tip to clean off. Replace the plastic cover and plug it back into the wall. My moth population is now under control, so I am not seeing as many dead moths.
customer_reviews.author: N. WONG

customer_reviews.title: It is indoor use only.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I got this bug zapper I wanted one for indoor uses. It is easy to clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: angela carr

customer_reviews.title: Dont Waste Your Money...
customer_reviews.text: Do you need a $13 nightlight...... I have one for you*
customer_reviews.author: MAURICIO PILARTE

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, just plug it in. Catches small flying bugs. Easy to clean out, just open it up and empty it.
customer_reviews.author: mynameisb0b

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: First off I like the design, it fits in well with our decor. Secondly, it works! Before the purchase every night we had mosquitoes buzzing and biting and keeping us awake. Not one buzz or bite since and we can see the mosquitoes that have been killed. Very pleased. A suggestion is to include a small brush to make cleaning easier - we use an old toothbrush for now but htat's a small point. Great price point too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product, it really works
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied, the device is easy to use, it works well, I really kill the mosquitoes, I recommend this product and the seller delivers fast. It is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Kareth paola

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine told me of this product. I ordered two and within a week there where already dozens of mosquitoes dead on devices. Amazing product!! I keep my doors and windows closed all the time. I didn’t realize i had this many in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s great
customer_reviews.text: Works good indoors. Only useful at night. we have one in the kitchen near the garage/back doors as that’s where the bugs usually come in. Have one in our bedroom for the always pesky night mosquito. Could stand to be brighter to attract more bugs, but it’s dull enough it doesn’t keep me awake.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that such a small device would actually work for my situation. I have this one plugged into the garage outlet. I don't leave it on all the time, just when I see or hear flies have followed me into the garage. Then I turn the unit on and it is essentially the only light in the garage. I have to say, this thing works great. Several flies have already met their doom. Plug it in, flip the switch. Nothing could be easier. No chemicals to spray around etc. And the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Jay D.

customer_reviews.title: Might have actually helped
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my folks who had a bit of a fruit fly issue in the kitchen. With other treatments, the flys are gone now. It won’t take them all out over night, but it helps, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Badgerr inc

customer_reviews.title: Entirely ineffective
customer_reviews.text: As a nightlight, this little thing is great; as a bug zapper, however, it is entirely ineffective. The question is, who would knowingly spend more than a couple bucks on a nightlight? If your expectation of actually terminating the lives a tiny creatures with this product is low... go for it. Otherwise don’t waste your money. *** UPDATE 3/19/20 *** So, my little, extremely close to useless, night light, is still running 24/7. As in the beginning, however, I haven’t killed a bug with it yet (they’re there, just not being killed).
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT M.

customer_reviews.title: Bugs Not Interested
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because the reviews seemed good but I haven't found it to work for me at all. I have had a couple of irritating bugs flying in the house and it has yet to zap them. The bugs don't seem to find interest in it even though at night it's the only thing that's glowing but when I check the next day there is nothing caught inside the zapper.
customer_reviews.author: INTERESTING VIEWPOINT

customer_reviews.title: Worked as promised...
customer_reviews.text: Plugged the Gloue Zapper into an outlet over the laundry machines in my garage. At first I didn't think it was doing much since it was so silent. Then took a close look inside and the grid was plastered with mosquitoes and small gnats after a few warm days! Now I can go out to do the laundry without being attacked by mosquitoes : ) . Been cleaning the zapper out every few days with a can of compressed air. Interesting product, would recommend. Might work for fruit flies as well.
customer_reviews.author: dave2zone

customer_reviews.title: Gnat killing machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for killing mosquitoes in our bedroom, which is does very well. I'm going to buy another one because it is a gnat killing machine. It would be amazing to have one in my kitchen to kill all those annoying fruit flies. It has a nice blue light and does a fantastic job. Anywhere you have annoying flying bugs this is the night light you need.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Haven't seen a mosquito since!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! We were getting mosquitoes in the house every time we opened the door to take the dog out. If any have been getting in, I haven't seen them! Definitely worth what we paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: zap bugs here
customer_reviews.text: these lights really brighten up the room to where you don't need your night light and they are quit
customer_reviews.author: kathy b.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Simple plug in and forget about it, it caught 3 flies within a week of me getting it, very satisfied as it's a low maintence device that does exactly what it states it will do! Low power usage and easy to clean, no complaints and for the price, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Chris77

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, but effective
customer_reviews.text: Just getting into mosquito season here and it seems to attract them pretty well. Not sure the longevity of product, but so far pleased with value of product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Britton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Flimsy broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I plugged the zapper in and it broke immediately. I will be returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unit was defective and unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: Defective. The unit did not work. When we unplugged it, one of the prongs remained in the wall socket. We had to disconnect power to remove the prong from the wall socket. That seemed unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: We have the zapper mounted in the kitchen behind the coffee maker, where the gnats go after the coffee grounds. We are going to have to clean it soon, it has zapped several in the last couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Mal Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great for the small little flying bugs
customer_reviews.text: Well this was full of bugs to my surprise mostly small little flying ones not the big flies though. Mostly gnats and mosquitos Totally surprised and totally happy I'm buying another one
customer_reviews.author: Tonyisme

customer_reviews.title: Useless Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these bug zippers hoping they would help eliminate mosquitos. After using them for about 2 weeks and everyone in my family getting several mosquito bites while not a single bug was killed, I returned them. These turned out to be completely useless. Also, I received a letter from the manufacturer (see photo), presumably an effort to encourage positive reviews. Pretty lousy business practice in my view.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Full of drain flys and gnats regularly. Highly recommend! Just be careful when emptying. You will get a shock if you don’t disarm it with a metal stick first!!
customer_reviews.author: Joby

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and small so doesnt take up alot of space. It seems to be working well for the room I have it in.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as apparently it is termite swarming season in Mississippi and after being attacked by two of them, something needed to be done. After plugging in and leaving it on, I have since not been attacked, and it's gotten some mosquitos and fruit flies that happened to work their way into my apartment. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an alternative to trying to karate-kid flies out of your living space.
customer_reviews.author: burgarl11

customer_reviews.title: bug zapper poor oroduct.
customer_reviews.text: one rating was 5 stars so i baught it for fruit flys, no fruit flys no nothing, it does not work, iwould not use it even as a paper weight, realy disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nancy wollslair

customer_reviews.title: Little Zapper Works Great & Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this little bug zapper for my lake house where bugs are ALWAYS a problem. I leave it out on our screened in porch and in the morning it's shocking how many little bugs this thing has killed. I bought a similar unit which I also like, but this one is much easier to clean with the snap-off cover.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: MIGHTIER AND BETTER THAN THE BULB TYPES
customer_reviews.text: didn't get much results from the light bulb type but as soon as i plugged this in -i haven't gotten bitten at all--smaller but MUCH MIGHTIER than the bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: TRISH THE DISH

customer_reviews.title: They don’t catch bugs...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get any bugs. I’ve seen bugs fly around it. When I’ve checked it days later, no bugs. I don’t believe these work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crist

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality it broke
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality the electrical plug came out and it started shocking me when I tried to unplug it. Bad quality. Otherwise it worked a little
customer_reviews.author: Mahena Lowen

customer_reviews.title: Blends In and Doesn't Overheat
customer_reviews.text: The room I use the Bug Zapper for has a lot of comings and goings from the outside, so bugs always get in. I needed something that could safely function for long periods of time while not sticking out like a sore thumb. I left the Zapper plugged in for one day and then two and then three and it didnt overheat. Great and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and good night light that also kills bugs
customer_reviews.text: This little bug zapper works nice in our kitchen and master bath. It also doubles as a night light. We've used it for a couple of weeks so far, and it seems to work just fine. They send a letter offering a $10 GC for my review, but it has not influenced my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for the up north camper. Had a hundred misquito's in the camper. Ran for a week not one dead misquito. Then I get a letter offering a 10 dollar coupon for a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: maxndale

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not one single fly, mosquito or gnat has been harmed since I've purchased this product. Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rojas

customer_reviews.title: RETURNING & WARNING WON'T CATCH ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean because it catches NOTHING!!! I've bought other brands/styles that work. All this does is fill an electric socket ony wall.
customer_reviews.author: JonTop Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: GLOUE Bug Zapper Electronic Mosquito Zapper Electronic Insect Killer Eliminates Most Flying Pests-Latest Type in 2019
feature_bullets: MOST EFFECTIVE & POWERFUL: The 2019 latest type of mosquito zapper made of Eco-friendly material. It operates noiselessly by simply plugging it into an AC outlet. It attracts bugs with emitting high-intensity UV light. Then the electrically charged high voltage metal grids will electrocute the insects. You will get rid of all unwanted insects and bugs immediately.

SMALL SIZE & POWERFUL INSECT CONTROL: electronic mosquito killer comes with a special light tube that emits ultra-violet rays to lure insects such as mosquitoes, flies and etc., and then the electrically charged high voltage metal grids will electrocute the insects. You will get rid of all flying insects and bugs immediately with high efficiency indoor mosquito killer! Please remember to turn off other lights and leave this insect killer on in your room for whole night!

EASY TO CLEAN - The Eliminator Mosquito and Fly Trap is simple to clean; dead flies get trapped in a neat hidden tray located at the bottom of the device. To clean, simply remove the tray and wash with warm water; let it air-dry and it’s ready for its next fly catching session. Simple, effective and clean!

NATURAL, CHEMICAL-FREE PEST CONTROL: Stop exposing your family and yourself to harmful chemicals. This electric zapper is the perfect chemical-free pest control alternative, safe to use in every indoor setting with a heavy flying pest infestation problem.

Note: This bug zapper can be used for indoors ONLY. It should be positioned in room darkest areas, far from windows or other light sources. Due to electric shock danger, please keep it away from the children is necessary.
